koreader.title: KOReader Sync Configuration
koreader.description: Configure KOReader integration to sync your reading progress between your device and Booklore library.
koreader.syncConfigDesc: Enable and configure synchronization between your Booklore library and KOReader device.
koreader.enableSyncDesc: Turn on synchronization to automatically sync your reading progress.
koreader.syncWithBooklore: Sync reading progress with Booklore eBook Reader
koreader.syncWithBookloreDesc: Enable bidirectional sync between Booklore's eBook reader and KOReader. Note: Progress sync is approximate and may update by chapter rather than exact page or location.
koreader.apiPathDesc: The API endpoint path for your KOReader sync service.
koreader.usernameDesc: Your username for authenticating with the KOReader sync service.
koreader.passwordDesc: Your password for authenticating with the KOReader sync service.
koreader.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.
koreader.settingsManagementDesc: Save your credentials or edit existing settings.
koreader.accessDenied: Access to KOReader sync is restricted.
koreader.loadError: Unable to retrieve KOReader account. Please try again.
koreader.syncUpdateError: Unable to update KOReader sync setting. Please try again.
koreader.bookloreReaderEnabled: Booklore eBook Reader sync has been enabled.
koreader.bookloreReaderDisabled: Booklore eBook Reader sync has been disabled.
koreader.bookloreReaderError: Unable to update Booklore eBook Reader sync setting. Please try again.
koreader.credentialsError: Failed to save KOReader credentials. Please try again.

kobo.title: Kobo Integration Configuration
kobo.description: Configure Kobo device integration to sync your library books and reading progress with your Kobo e-reader.
kobo.syncConfigDesc: Enable and configure synchronization between your Booklore library and Kobo device.
kobo.enableSyncDesc: Turn on synchronization to automatically sync your library books to your Kobo device.
kobo.autoAddLabel: Auto-Add New Books to Kobo Shelf
kobo.autoAddDesc: When enabled, newly added books will be automatically added to your Kobo shelf for syncing. This eliminates the need to manually add each book to the shelf.
kobo.tokenDesc: Your unique sync token for authenticating with your Kobo device. Keep this secure.
kobo.tokenManagementDesc: Regenerate your sync token if needed. This will invalidate the current token.
kobo.markAsReadingDesc: Books are marked as "Reading" when progress exceeds this percentage. This helps automatically track which books you've started.
kobo.markAsReadingRec: 1% (default) - marks as reading after the first page or two.
kobo.markAsFinishedDesc: Books are marked as "Finished" when progress reaches this percentage. Accounts for books where the last few pages are acknowledgments or index.
kobo.markAsFinishedRec: 99% (default) - marks as finished when nearly complete.
kobo.adminSettingsDesc: Configure advanced Kobo sync settings that affect all users on this server.
kobo.convertKepubPros: KEPUB format enables enhanced Kobo features like better typography, reading stats, and faster page turns.
kobo.convertKepubCons: Conversion takes extra processing time and may occasionally fail for complex layouts. Books over the size limit below will skip conversion automatically.
kobo.conversionSizeLimitDesc: Large files (100MB+) can cause conversion timeouts and server strain. Lower limits ensure faster syncing but may skip conversion of larger books.
kobo.conversionSizeLimitRec: 50-100MB for most libraries. Very large books will sync as regular EPUB regardless of this setting.
kobo.forceHyphenationDesc: Force enable hyphenation. Otherwise, hyphenation is only enabled when text alignment on the Kobo device is explicitly set to justified.
kobo.convertCbxDesc: Converts CBX files to EPUB during Kobo sync, allowing CBX files to be downloaded and read on Kobo devices.
kobo.imageCompressionDesc: Comic book conversions can sometimes result in very large files. This setting allows you to compress the images during conversion to prevent size from shooting up.
kobo.cbxSizeLimitDesc: Comic book archives can be very large due to high-resolution images. Set a reasonable limit to prevent server overload during conversion.
kobo.cbxSizeLimitRec: 100-200MB for most comic libraries. CBX files over this limit will not be converted or synced to the device.
kobo.accessDenied: Access to Kobo sync is restricted.
kobo.confirmRegenerate: This will generate a new token and invalidate the previous one. Continue?
kobo.confirmDisable: Disabling Kobo sync will delete your Kobo shelf. Are you sure you want to proceed?
kobo.autoAddEnabled: New books will be automatically added to Kobo shelf

hardcover.title: Hardcover Integration
hardcover.description: Sync your reading progress from Booklore to your Hardcover account.
hardcover.syncConfigDesc: Enable and configure synchronization between Booklore and Hardcover.
hardcover.syncLabel: Sync KOReader Reading Progress to Hardcover
hardcover.syncDesc: When enabled, your KOReader reading progress will be automatically synced to your Hardcover account.
hardcover.apiKeyDesc: Your personal Hardcover API key. Get it from hardcover.app/account/api. This key is used only for syncing your reading progress and is not shared with other users.
hardcover.accessDenied: Access to Hardcover sync is restricted.
hardcover.loadError: Unable to retrieve Hardcover sync settings. Please try again.
hardcover.updateError: Unable to update Hardcover sync settings. Please try again.
